nagarika palpathwasi adu aadayamlabhin sandaha ‚Äúmahal niwasa sankirna‚Äù idikere.niwasa eekaka hathalis dahasak me yatathe idikirimata niyamithaya.ee anuwa palamu niwasa eekaka haradahasa idikirime wyapruthiya labana wasare di aarambha kirimata niyamithaya.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha ge wishesha upades matha mema wyapruthiya idikirim, injineru sewa, niwasa ha podu pahasukam amathyanshaya magin kriyawata nanwayi.danata kolambaa nagaraye adu pahasukam sahitha palpathwala ha mudukkuwala jiwath wana pirisa siyayata panahak pamana wana bawa ki amathiwaraya, owun padinchi niwasa eekaka 65,000k pamana athi bawada kiweya.

mulleriyawe wedi thabime siddhiyen miyagiya janadhipathi jyeshta upadeshaka bharatha lakshman pe‡∑äramachandra mahathage biriyata ha daruwanta durakathana magin maraniya tharjana ella kara aththe kawurunda yanna sambandhawa wimarshana sidukarana bawa kurunduwaththa polisiya kolambaa pradhana mahesthrath rashmi singappuli mahathata eeye (21) danwiya.me siddhiya sambandhawa kurunduwaththa polisiya sidukarana wimarshana sandaha maraniya tharjana ella kara athi bawa kiyana durakathana ankayan wetha lada ha labagath amathum sambandha warthawak labadennayi pradhana mahesthrath rashmi singappuli mahatha shri lanka telikom aayathanaye kalamanakaruta eeye (21) niyoga keleya.
